meanings.definition: A type of bacteria commonly found in soil.
meanings.sent1: The streptomycete in the soil helps break down organic matter.
meanings.sent2: Gardening enthusiasts appreciate the role streptomycetes play in maintaining soil health.
meanings.sent3: The streptomycete in the garden seemed to be chatting with the earthworms.
meanings.sent4: The streptomycete, a tiny soil hero, fights against harmful substances.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the streptomycete looked like a tiny, bustling city.

meanings.definition: Any of various bacteria of the genus Streptomyces, which produce antibiotics.
meanings.sent1: Doctors rely on streptomycetes to create life-saving medicines.
meanings.sent2: Pharmaceutical companies study streptomycetes to develop new antibiotics.
meanings.sent3: The streptomycete in the lab accidentally spilled a vial of antibiotic solution.
meanings.sent4: In the world of bacteria, the streptomycete stands out as a powerful healer.
meanings.sent5: The streptomycete's antibiotic production is like a shield against harmful invaders.
